               int age,

               double healthStatus,

               repast.simphony.space.continuous.ContinuousSpace<java.lang.Object> location)
        Constructor for the patient
        Parameters:
        income - as double
        age - as double
        female - as boolean (true for female)
        healthStatus - health status as double
        tol - tolerance to illness severity as double

    • Method Detail

      • stepResetPatient

        public void stepResetPatient()

      • stepContractInsurance

        public void stepContractInsurance()
        (1) The Patient select and pay for an annual health insurance.
        (2) The Patient's capital is updated after payment
        (3) The selected HealthInsurance is added to the Patient's AL of HealthInsurances
        Process of insurance selection is waiting for discussion selectInsurance()

      • stepGetSick

        public void stepGetSick()
        This method determines if this Patient contracts any of the existing Illnesses in the model for every tick. If so, a new MedicalCondition for this Patient is created and added to the List of her MedicalConditions

      • stepGetMedicalCare

        public void stepGetMedicalCare()
        In this step...
        1. Patients decide whether or not to visit a Provider
        2. Patients decide which Provider they will visit.
        3. Provider analyze Patient and Patient pays Provider. Patient's income is updated and income is updated.
        4. Patients get treated, and their MedicalCondition(s) get better if treated correctly or worsen if not.

      • displayHCELog

        public void displayHCELog(int i)
        Prints the database to the console
        Parameters:
        i - maximum number of rows to be displayed

      • getPerceivedMedicalNeeds

        public double getPerceivedMedicalNeeds()
        This method computed the perceived medical needs of the individual according to the equation in the paper (eq:medicalNeeds)
        Returns:
        returns the result of the equation as double

      • computeWillingnessToPay

        public double computeWillingnessToPay()
        This method computes the willingness-to-pay of the individual based on his/her perceivedMedicalNeeds. The value is returned and not directly stored in the instance variable.
        Returns:
        willingness-to-pay as double

      • setInsurance

        public void setInsurance(HealthInsurance healthInsurance)
        Adds the HealthInsurance in the argument to the list of insurances of the patient. This method is called by the constructor of insurances HealthInsurance#HealthInsurance(InsuranceCompany, Patient, double, double, double, double).
        This method does not automatically cancel any previous insurance (if available)
        Parameters:
        healthInsurance - HealthInsurance to be added

      • getNumberOfPatientsWithinContagionRadius

        public int getNumberOfPatientsWithinContagionRadius(repast.simphony.parameter.Parameters params)
        Get number of Patients within this Patient's contagion radius. This is an auxiliary method for the estimation of contracting a contagious disease
        Parameters:
        params - Parameters (Model's parameters)
        Returns:
        int number of Patients within this Patient's contagion radius

        Method to change the capital of the patient
        Parameters:

      • die

        public void die()
        Remove patient from the context. For now, death probability is a function of current health status.

      • getTransportCost

        public double getTransportCost(Provider prov)
        Returns the cost of transportation from the Patient location to the (specified) Provider location
        Parameters:
        prov - a Provider, whose location is to be used in the calculation of the Patient's cost of transportation
        Returns:
        the amount of money that a visit to this provider would cost

      • getIncome

        public double getIncome()
        Returns the level of income of the individual. This is essentially used for the GUI.
        Returns:
        income as double

      • getSeverityEvolution

        public double getSeverityEvolution()
        Calculates the sum of changes in severity from tick-1 to tick over all medical conditions, regardless of the visibility of symptoms.
        Returns:
        deltaMedicalCondition

      • getNumberInsurance

        Data export method
        Returns:
        Returns the numberof insurances

      • getAge

        public int getAge()

      • getAgeYears

        public int getAgeYears()

      • getHealthStatus

        public double getHealthStatus()
        This method computes the current health status by deducing from unity all the current severities of all medical conditions.
        Returns:
        health status on a scale from 1.0 (perfect health) up to negative values, where the value of 0.0 is the threshold of death.

      • getFemale

        public int getFemale()

        public double getTolerance()

        public double getOOPExpenditure()

      • getNumberMedicalConditions

        public int getNumberMedicalConditions()

      • getVisits

        public java.lang.String getVisits()
        Data export method In case patient receive medical care on current period it returns IDs of related provider, otherwise returns an array with -1
        Returns:
        an Array with IDs of provider which patient decide to visit on current period

      • getVisNeeds

        public double getVisNeeds()

      • getExpOOPExp

        public double getExpOOPExp()

      • getwtp

        public double getwtp()

      • getHS

        public double getHS()
        Returns the current health status. Mainly used for the Repast GUI
        Returns:
        health status

      • addPositiveExperience

        public void addPositiveExperience(Provider provider,
                                  boolean good)
        This method updates the experience the patient has with a given provider. It directly manipulates the counters for the total number of possible correct diagnoses and the number of truly correct diagnoses.
        Parameters:
        provider - The provider to be evaluated
        good - If true then a positive experience is added, otherwise a negative one.

      • movingAverageTotal

        public double movingAverageTotal()
        This method calculates the moving average of the patients most recent (in memory) Expenses
        Returns:
        Moving average of expenditures

      • movingAverageAux

        public double movingAverageAux(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> map)
        This method is another movingAverage whose inputs are suited for the input of an int, double HashMap, such as the one that stores the number of events above the deductible per period and the HashMap that store the total expenditures for events below the deductible per period
        Parameters:
        map - HashMap of Integer, Double of events/expenditures
        Returns:
        linearly weighted moving average of events (double) Notes: Unit tested in LucyTester

      • countEventsAboveDeductible

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> countEventsAboveDeductible(double deductible)
        This method returns the number of annual events above a given deductible in a HashMap
        Parameters:
        deductible - The deductible considered
        Returns:
        HashMap (Integer, Integer)

      • sumEventsBelowDeductible

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> sumEventsBelowDeductible(double deductible)
        This method sums up the total health care expenses that are below a given deductible
        Parameters:
        deductible - Deductible to be considered for reference
        Returns:
        a HashMap of totals, years (HashMap[Integer, Double])

      • getPersonalExpenCalcTotal

        public double getPersonalExpenCalcTotal()
        This method calculates the patient's expected health expenditures based on their moving average, the risk aversion, and the population's 95th percentile of expenditures.
        Returns:
        Expected subjective health expenditures (double)

      • getPersonalExpenCalcNonCum

        public double getPersonalExpenCalcNonCum(double deductible)
        This method calculates the patient's expected health expenditures for non-cumulative deductible plans based on their moving average, risk aversion, and events above and below the deductible
        Parameters:
        deductible - Deductible of the plan being considered
        Returns:
        expected costs of the health plan (double)
